sentences.sContent: Exercise regularly if you can, play sports, toss a ball around with your family.
sentences.sContent_eng: Exercise regularly if you can, play sports, toss a ball around with your family.
sentences.sCn: 尽可能有规律地锻炼，可以做运动，或者和家人一起传球玩。

sentences.sContent: Women who play sports and frequently cycle or swim can also break their hymen, even though they might be virgins.
sentences.sContent_eng: Women who play sports and frequently cycle or swim can also break their hymen, even though they might be virgins.
sentences.sCn: 女性做运动和经常性地骑自行车或游泳都可以让她们的处女膜破裂，即使她们可能是处女。

sentences.sContent: He liked to hang with the guys and play sports.
sentences.sContent_eng: He liked to hang with the guys and play sports.
sentences.sCn: 他喜欢和男友一起打发时间或者做些运动。
